originalText.text:
I had the pleasure of receiving treatment from Jessica at CPW and I couldn't be happier with the results! Her professionalism and expertise were truly impressive.

From the moment I walked in, Jessica made me feel comfortable and well-informed. She took the time to listen to my concerns and explained the treatment process in detail, putting any worries I had at ease.

Her skill and precision during the procedure were remarkable. I knew I was in capable hands throughout.

Not only did Jessica deliver fantastic results, but she also followed up with me to ensure I was satisfied and provided valuable post-treatment care advice. I appreciate Jessica's dedication to her craft and her commitment to client satisfaction.

originalText.text: Jessica and her team are absolutely wonderful!   The moment you walk into her beautiful, immaculate and centrally located office, you are greeted by her lovely staff.   Jessica’s incredible attention to detail and calming demeanor makes you feel at ease.  She is a true artist and has perfected her craft.  Every treatment I have done over the years has been with precision and great care.  I always leave her office, feeling uplifted and beautiful. What more can you ask for!?

text.text: Jessica and her team are absolutely wonderful!   The moment you walk into her beautiful, immaculate and centrally located office, you are greeted by her lovely staff.   Jessica’s incredible attention to detail and calming demeanor makes you feel at ease.  She is a true artist and has perfected her craft.  Every treatment I have done over the years has been with precision and great care.  I always leave her office, feeling uplifted and beautiful. What more can you ask for!?

originalText.text: Jessica and her staff are top notch! I have been going to Jessica for over a decade. She has the hands of a surgeon, precise and meticulous. I have very bad spider veins and after my initial treatments many years ago I shifted to 2x a year maintenance treatments and my legs look fantastic! Jessica is personable, professional, and lovely to interact with. I am always seen on time and my sessions are efficient, yet do the job every time. I have also had the IPL laser on my face to remove dark spots and that has worked remarkably well. Jessica's front of the house staff and medical assistants are always friendly and warm. I highly recommend CPW Vein & Aesthetic center and have encouraged many of friends to use their services as well. All have been very happy with the treatments, quality of care, fair prices, and friendly staff.

originalText.text: I currently work within the aesthetic industry. As someone who has been exposed to many providers, I can confidently say that Jessica and her team are the most talented and professional group there is. Jessica has the ability to create a comfortable and welcoming environment while providing beautiful results. Jessica is now the only provider I see for all of my aesthetic treatments and I couldn’t recommend her and the team enough. I always feel like I’m in the best hands with Jessica and her team!

originalText.text: I have been going to Jessica for nearly two decades for various head-to-toe procedures. I live in Manhattan and I have high standards, often unimpressed from most others in her field. Jessica Plotnick's bedside manner, expertise and especially the gentle touch that Jessica AND her amazing staff provide are exemplary! Her pricing is fair and her office is immaculate. She doesn't pressure or oversell, she actually tells me what I need vs. what I want, so I trust her opinion over my own. I don't often write reviews but Jessica's results and customer service warrant 5+ stars. I would not look my best without her and I wouldn't trust anyone else.
